TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ControlCachePolicy extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供对 ASP.NET 用户控件的输出缓存设置的编程访问。

span.span: Provides programmatic access to an ASP.NET user control's output cache settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 编程用户控件方案中的开发人员使用 类来指定用户控件（.ascx 文件）的输出缓存设置。The class is used by developers in programmatic user control scenarios to specify output caching settings for user controls (.ascx files). ASP.NET 在 实例中嵌入用户控件。ASP.NET embeds user controls within a instance. 类表示启用了输出缓存的用户控件。The class represents a user control that has output caching enabled. 当访问 控件的 属性时，将始终接收有效的 对象。When you access the property of a control, you will always receive a valid object. 但是，如果您访问 控件的 属性，则只有在用户控件已被 控件包装的情况下，才会收到有效的 对象。However, if you access the property of a control, you receive a valid object only if the user control is already wrapped by a control. 如果未包装，则当你尝试对属性返回的 对象没有关联的 时，将引发异常。If it is not wrapped, the object returned by the property will throw exceptions when you attempt to manipulate it because it does not have an associated . 若要确定 实例是否支持缓存而不生成异常，请检查 属性。To determine whether a instance supports caching without generating exceptions, inspect the property. 使用 类是可以实现输出缓存的多种方式之一。Using the class is one of several ways you can enable output caching. 以下列表描述了可用于启用输出缓存的方法：The following list describes methods you can use to enable output caching: - 使用指令启用声明性方案中的输出缓存。Use the directive to enable output caching in declarative scenarios. - 使用 特性可为代码隐藏文件中的用户控件启用缓存。Use the attribute to enable caching for a user control in a code-behind file. - 使用 类在编程方案中指定缓存设置，在此方案中，使用以前的方法之一并使用 方法动态加载已启用缓存的 实例。Use the class to specify cache settings in programmatic scenarios in which you are working with instances that have been cache-enabled using one of the previous methods and dynamically loaded using the method. 只能在控件生命周期的 `Init` 和 `PreRender` 阶段之间成功地处理 实例。A instance can be successfully manipulated only between the `Init` and `PreRender` stages of the control life cycle. 如果在 `PreRender` 阶段之后修改 对象，ASP.NET 将引发异常，因为呈现控件后所做的任何更改都不会影响缓存设置（控件在 `Render` 阶段缓存）。If you modify a object after the `PreRender` phase, ASP.NET throws an exception, because any changes made after the control is rendered cannot actually affect cache settings (a control is cached during the `Render` stage). 最后，用户控件实例（因此它的 对象）仅适用于实际呈现时的编程操作。Finally, a user control instance (and therefore its object) is only available for programmatic manipulation when it is actually rendered. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在运行时动态加载用户控件并以编程方式进行操作。The following code example demonstrates how a user control can be loaded dynamically and manipulated programmatically at run time. 属性应用于名为 `SimpleControl`的用户控件，这意味着在运行时由 控件包装用户控件。The attribute is applied to a user control named `SimpleControl`, which means the user control is wrapped by a control at run time. `SimpleControl` 对象的缓存设置可以通过其关联的 对象以编程方式进行操作，该对象可通过对包装该对象的 控件的引用提供。The `SimpleControl` object's caching settings can be programmatically manipulated through its associated object, which is available through a reference to the control that wraps it. 在此示例中，如果满足某些条件，则在页初始化期间检查 属性，并使用 和 方法进行更改。In this example, the property is examined during page initialization and changed using the and methods if some conditions are met. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2/CS/Default2.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2/VB/Default2.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 Web 窗体页中的 `SimpleControl` 用户控件。The following code example demonstrates using the `SimpleControl` user control from a Web Forms page. 若要成功运行此示例，请确保用户控件文件（.ascx）、其代码隐藏文件（.cs 或 .vb）以及承载用户控件（.aspx）的 Web 窗体页位于同一个目录中。To run this example successfully, make sure the user control file (.ascx), its code-behind file (.cs or .vb), and the Web Forms page that hosts the user control (.aspx) are in the same directory. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2/CS/SimpleControl.ascx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2/VB/SimpleControl.ascx.vb#2)] [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2/CS/SimpleControl.ascx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2/VB/SimpleControl.ascx#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置与缓存的用户控件输出关联的 类的实例。

span.span: Gets or sets an instance of the class associated with the cached user control output.
The associated with the control.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性委托给包装用户控件的 控件的 属性。The property delegates to the property of the control that wraps the user control. 实例失效后，将从缓存中删除用户控件。When the instance is invalidated, the user control is removed from the cache.

exception.span: 用户控件与 没有关联，因此不可缓存。

span.span: The user control is not associated with a and is not cacheable.
-or-

span.span: The property is set outside of the initialization and rendering stages of the control.

member this.Duration : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置缓存的项将在输出缓存中保留的时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of time that cached items are to remain in the output cache.

value.span: ，表示用户控件将在输出缓存中保留的时间。

span.span: A that represents the amount of time a user control is to remain in the output cache.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用 方法设置绝对过期策略，则 属性将返回缓存条目过期之前的剩余时间量。If an absolute expiration policy is set using the method, the property returns the amount of time remaining until cache entry expiration. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在运行时动态加载用户控件并以编程方式进行操作。The following code example demonstrates how a user control can be loaded dynamically and manipulated programmatically at run time. 属性应用于名为 `SimpleControl`的用户控件，这意味着它在运行时由 控件包装。The attribute is applied to a user control named `SimpleControl`, which means it is wrapped by a control at run time. `SimpleControl` 对象的缓存设置可以通过其关联的 对象以编程方式进行操作，该对象可通过对包装该对象的 控件的引用提供。The `SimpleControl` object's caching settings can be programmatically manipulated through its associated object, which is available through a reference to the control that wraps it. 在此示例中，在页初始化期间会检查 属性，如果满足某些条件，则会更改缓存过期。In this example, the property is examined during page initialization and cache expiration is changed if some conditions are met. 此示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2/CS/Default2.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2/VB/Default2.aspx#1)]

member this.ProviderName : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置与控件实例关联的输出缓存提供程序的名称，。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the output-cache provider that is associated with a control instance.
The name of the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用 属性，您可以通过使用 实例指定与控件关联的当前输出缓存提供程序。The property enables you to specify the current output-cache provider that is associated with a control, by using the instance. 只有在控件生命周期中发生 事件之后，才能设置此属性。This property can be set only before the event occurs in the control life cycle.

span.span: The provider name was not found.

exception.span: 尝试在 事件期间或之后设置 属性。

span.span: An attempt was made to set the property during or after the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetExpires(valuetype System.DateTime expirationTime) cil managed

span.span: A after which the cached entry expires.

summary.span: 指示包装用户控件的 控件在指定的日期和时间使缓存项过期。

span.span: Instructs the control that wraps the user control to expire the cache entry at the specified date and time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 和 方法（传递 `true`）指示包装用户控件的 控件使用可调过期缓存策略，而不是绝对过期策略。Use the and methods (passing `true`) to instruct the control that wraps the user control to use a sliding expiration caching policy instead of an absolute expiration policy. 使用 方法和 方法（传递 `false`）指定绝对过期策略。Use the method and the method (passing `false`) to specify an absolute expiration policy. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在运行时动态加载用户控件并以编程方式进行操作。The following code example demonstrates how a user control can be loaded dynamically and manipulated programmatically at run time. 属性应用于名为 `SimpleControl`的用户控件，这意味着在运行时由 控件包装用户控件。The attribute is applied to a user control named `SimpleControl`, which means the user control is wrapped by a control at run time. `SimpleControl` 对象的缓存设置可以通过其关联的 对象以编程方式进行操作，该对象可通过对包装该对象的 控件的引用提供。The `SimpleControl` object's caching settings can be programmatically manipulated through its associated object, which is available through a reference to the control that wraps it. 在此示例中，如果满足某些条件，则在页初始化期间检查 属性，并使用 和 方法进行更改。In this example, the property is examined during page initialization and changed using the and methods if some conditions are met. 此示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2/CS/Default2.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2/VB/Default2.aspx#1)]

param.name: useSlidingExpiration
param.span: 如果使用可调缓存过期而不是绝对过期，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to use sliding cache expiration instead of absolute expiration; otherwise, .

summary.span: 指示包装用户控件的 控件将用户控件的缓存项设置为使用可调或绝对过期。

span.span: Instructs the control that wraps the user control to set the user control's cache entry to use sliding or absolute expiration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 和 方法（传递 `true`）指示包装用户控件的 控件使用可调过期缓存策略，而不是绝对过期策略。Use the and methods (passing `true`) to instruct the control that wraps the user control to use a sliding expiration caching policy instead of an absolute expiration policy. 使用 方法和 方法（传递 `false`）指定绝对过期策略。Use the method and the method (passing `false`) to specify an absolute expiration policy. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在运行时动态加载用户控件并以编程方式进行操作。The following code example demonstrates how a user control can be loaded dynamically and manipulated programmatically at run time. 名为 `SimpleControl` 的用户控件使用 特性进行修饰，这意味着它在运行时由 控件包装。A user control named `SimpleControl` is decorated with a attribute, which means it is wrapped by a control at run time. `SimpleControl` 对象的缓存设置可以通过其关联的 对象以编程方式进行操作，该对象可通过对包装该对象的 控件的引用提供。The `SimpleControl` object's caching settings can be programmatically manipulated through its associated object, which is available through a reference to the control that wraps it. 在此示例中，缓存设置在页初始化期间进行检查，并在满足某些条件时进行更改。In this example, caching settings are examined during page initialization and changed if some conditions are met. 此示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2/CS/Default2.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy_2/VB/Default2.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetVaryByCustom(string varyByCustom) cil managed

span.span: The list of custom strings.

summary.span: 设置要由输出缓存用来改变用户控件的自定义字符串列表。

span.span: Sets a list of custom strings that the output cache will use to vary the user control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将 "browser" 作为 `varyByCustom` 参数传递，则用户控件将按浏览器类型和主要版本号进行变化。If you pass "browser" as the `varyByCustom` parameter, the user control will be varied by browser type and major version number. 如果输入了另一个自定义字符串，则必须重写应用程序的 global.asax 文件中的 方法。If another custom string is entered, you must override the method in your application's Global.asax file.

exception.span: 用户控件与 没有关联，因此不可缓存。

span.span: The user control is not associated with a and is not cacheable.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SupportsCaching As Boolean
public: property bool SupportsCaching { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示用户控件是否支持缓存。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the user control supports caching.

value.span: 如果用户控件支持缓存，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user control supports caching; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果用户控件与 实例相关联，则该用户控件支持缓存，这会发出信号，指示 ASP.NET 分析器分析了指令或用户控件已使用 属性进行修饰。A user control supports caching if it is associated with a instance, which signals that either an directive was parsed by the ASP.NET parser or the user control was decorated with a attribute.

summary.span: 获取或设置要用来改变缓存输出的控件标识符列表。

span.span: Gets or sets a list of control identifiers to vary the cached output by.

value.span: 分号分隔的字符串列表，用于改变用户控件的输出缓存。

span.span: A semicolon-separated list of strings used to vary a user control's output cache.

value.span: 这些字符串表示在用户控件中声明的 ASP.NET 服务器控件的 属性值。

span.span: These strings represent the property values of ASP.NET server controls declared in the user control.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VaryByParams As HttpCacheVaryByParams
public: property System::Web::HttpCacheVaryByParams ^ VaryByParams { System::Web::HttpCacheVaryByParams ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要用来改变缓存输出的 或 参数名称列表。

span.span: Gets or sets a list of or parameter names to vary the cached output by.

value.span: 分号分隔的字符串列表，用于使输出缓存发生变化。

span.span: A semicolon-separated list of strings used to vary the output cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，这些字符串对应于使用 GET 方法发送的查询字符串值或使用 POST 方法发送的参数。By default, these strings correspond to a query string value sent with the GET method or to a parameter sent using the POST method. 如果将 属性设置为多个参数，则输出缓存会为每个指定的参数包含不同版本的请求文档。When the property is set to multiple parameters, the output cache contains a different version of the requested document for each specified parameter. 可能的值包括“none”、“\*”以及任何有效的查询字符串或 POST 参数名。Possible values include "none", "\*", and any valid query string or POST parameter name.

exception.span: 用户控件与 没有关联，因此不可缓存。

span.span: The user control is not associated with a and is not cacheable.
